long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Macaroni Extension is Free Software available on Github under the GNU General Public License. The goal of the Macaroni Project is to assist malware researchers and analysts with access to VirusTotal Intelligence in their daily work. To make use of this extension, you must have access to VirusTotal Intelligence and an instance of a Macaroni Server. To find out more visit the Macaroni Project website: https://macaroni-project.org
